name: Day D: Tower Rush
description: Onwards to the past! Learn the real power of science! Help the professor and his loyal companion deal with hordes of dinosaurs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: 1500 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1.0GB of video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 167 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: 2000 MHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1.0GB of video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 167 MB available space
